price: Biz sizi bir az qorxu, bir az aclıq, bir az da mal-dövlət, insan və məhsul itkisi ilə sınayarıq. Səbir edənləri müjdələ.
arabic: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُم بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡخَوۡفِ وَٱلۡجُوعِ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَنفُسِ وَٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walanabluwannakum bishayin mina al-khawfi wal-jūʿi wanaqṣin mina al-amwāli wal-anfusi wal-thamarāti wabashiri al-ṣābirīna
translations: And surely We will test you
